title: Seirus Innovation 1176 Mens Heatwave All Weather Form Fit Polartec Glove with Soundtouch Touch Screen Technology
features: Shell: 50% Polyester / 40% Nylon / 10% Spandex, Palm Patch: 85% Polyester / 15% Polyurethane, Lining: 100% Polyester, Cuff: 100% Nylon
WAVES OF HEAT - Kinetic heat return system amplifies your body heat 4-5 degrees, and reflects it back to you for 20% more warmth
TALK, TEXT, SURF, SWIPE - Advanced touchscreen technology allows you to activate your smartphone or tablet without removing your gloves

LIGHTWEIGHT AND FAST DRYING - Our Weathershield Shell featuring Polartec's innovative knit construction provides a thermal insulation with proven durability, lightweight warmth and fast drying characteristics.
MAXIMUM WARMTH, MINIMUM BULK - Exclusive form Fit Design, and Heatwave lining makes this the most versatile lightweight glove for outdoor life
EASY OFF-EASY ON - Snug-fitting knit cuff has easy on and off flexibility. The Ultra Grip palm provides a non-slip surface for a sure grip
description: The Heatwave Soundtouch Original All Weather Glove from Seirus Innovation is the first in the industry to feature a dual heating system in touchscreen control gloves. Soundtouch allows you to operate any touchscreen device without removing your gloves, assuring the ultimate in convenience when using touchscreen devices. Our Heatwave kinetic heat return system amplifies reflected heat through thermal reflective technology (up to 20% warmer) and kinetic energy (amplifies temperature 4-5‚Å∞) Features Weathershield shell, UltraGrip palm, form-fit next to skin and knit cuff guaranteed to keep you warm and dry.
